newsitem.title: BAHRAIN: PRESS DIGEST - Saudi Arabia - Sept 18.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Saudi Arabia - Sept 18.

text.p: These are some of the leading stories in the Saudi Arabian press on Wednesday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- The Saudi Land Transport Company's loss in 1995 seen at up to 24 million riyals.
- Gulf Arab information officials review their information policies at GCC meeting.
- Drug smuggler caught with 37 kg of hashish, arms.
- Barley distributors in the local market unhappy over the Flour Mills and Grain Silos Organisation's decision to reduce their allocation of barley.
- 4,100 people in Saudi await kidney transplants.
- Over 100 insurance companies registered outside, but operating in the kingdom, seek registration in Saudi Arabia.
